snippet: The N.B.A. named Richard Parsons, a prominent business executive, to lead the Los Angeles Clippers on an interim basis as the league moves to strip Donald Sterling of his ownership stake in the franchise.
abstract: NBA names prominent business executive Richard Parsons to lead the Los Angeles Clippers on an interim basis as league moves to strip Donald Sterling of his ownership stake; Parsons was the former chairman of Citigroup and the former chief executive of Time Warner.

byline.original: By SCOTT CACCIOLA and WILLIAM ALDEN

lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. named Richard Parsons, a prominent business executive, to lead the Los Angeles Clippers on an interim basis as the league moves to strip Donald Sterling of his ownership stake in the franchise.

headline.main: Ex-Leader of Citigroup and Time Warner Is Appointed to Steer Clippers
headline.print_headline: Ex-Leader of Citigroup and Time Warner Is Appointed to Steer Clippers
